node.action: A potential action, task, activity... that can be undertaken within the given scope
node.potentiality: An external, potential event or change that is relevant within the given scope
node.objective: A potential objective, aim, goal to be pursued within the given scope
node.project: A potential project or initiative that can be undertaken within the given scope
node.title: What is this node about?
node.scope: Where/to whom does this node apply?
node.status: What stage is this node currently at?
node.draft: Not yet ready for full consideration
node.live: A node ready for full consideration
node.support: How strongly do you support this?
node.description: A longer description of the node

edge.require: Indicates a conditionality of the source on the target
edge.imply: Indicates an implication from the source to the target
edge.description: A longer description of the edge
edge.causal_strength_rating: How strongly does this condition contribute to this outcome?
edge.cprob: Conditional probability of the target node given the source node
edge.cprob_condition: How necessary is this condition for the source to realise?
edge.cprob_implication: How likely is this implication given the source?
